mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Receivership of the estate belonging to Maidie E. Howard, Who reached 21 years of age 07.02.1907
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Receivership of the estate belonging to Maidie E. Howard, Who reached 21 years of age 07.02.1907 B.G. Howard, Receiver of the estate until 07.02.1907 Recorded in the Settlement Book, page 375, of the Floyd County Circuit Court
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
